PreceptDef.label: revered
PreceptDef.description:
The fruits of water-fed fields are gifts from the divine.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Farms near water terrains (3 tiles or less) grow faster (+20% growth rate).
 - Farms more than 3 tiles awy from water grow slower (-20% growth rate).
 - This is calculated when the plant is sown.
